thread.title: Buccaneers release RB Mike James, juggle practice squad
thread.title_full: Buccaneers release RB Mike James, juggle practice squad | Boston Herald

author: Associated Press
title: Buccaneers release RB Mike James, juggle practice squad
text:
TAMPA, Fla. â€” The Tampa Bay Buccaneers have waived reserve running back Mike James, who had not appeared in a game this season.
The third-year pro started three of 20 games he played over the past two seasons with the Bucs, who drafted him in the sixth round in 2013.
The team also announced Tuesday that cornerback Imoan Claiborne was released from the practice squad, replaced by defensive tackle Derrick Lott.
James has rushed 79 times for 332 yards during his pro career. He also had 11 receptions for 38 yards during his stint with the Bucs.
___
